txt.en: Deliver the weapons to Harnion in Tarlang's Crown
Collect bows from corsairs in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected bows from corsairs in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect clubs from corsairs in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Harnion can be found alongside the road in Tarlang's Crown, to the north of Edhellond.\n\nYou have taken many of the corsairs' weapons, and should now deliver them to Harnion.
Collect clubs from corsairs in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Corsair raiders' swords, corsair look-outs' bows, and corsair hound-masters' clubs can be found throughout Tarlang's Crown.\n\nYou have encountered well-armed corsairs in Tarlang's Crown and should claim their weaponry lest another corsair raise arms against Gondor.

'Ah, you have done well to bring these to me, [placeholder].\n\n'Every weapon we take from our enemies stretches their resources in Tarlang's Crown thinner and thinner. We shall force them out of their defences in time... I am sure of it!'
The Corsairs of Tarlang's Crown wield many weapons against the people of Gondor, but without them, their forces would be greatly weakened.
Collected swords from corsairs in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

While searching for more information about the Heirs of Castamir, you have made a note of the corsairs' stores of arms amidst their defences.\n\nIf you could claim the weapons borne by the corsairs, their forces would slowly be weakened to allow for a more successful attack by the Men of Gondor.
Collect swords from corsairs in Tarlang's Crown ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Corsairs can be found throughout Tarlang's Crown.
